price: Kwa vikombe na mabirika na bilauri za vinywaji kutoka chemchem safi.
footnotes: Nao wamechukua vikombe na mabirika yaliyo jaa vinywaji vya Peponi, na bilauri zenye mvinyo kutoka chemchem zinazo miminika,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
